feed.title: Maxun Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Maxun: Maxun v0.0.12 | Full Sized Browser, Faster Highlighting‚ö°
entry.content:
What's New

Full Sized Browser üñ•Ô∏è

The browser now opens websites in full size to ensure no elements are missing

Faster & Smoother Highlighting ‚ö°

Optimized with caching & memoization, making the selection process more responsive.

What's Changed

  • feat: unique queue robot run execution for users by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/474
  • fix: adjust margin for consistent spacing by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/483
  • Feat: Resized Browser by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/478
  • feat: click next improvements by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/482
  • fix: attribute selection on link selections by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/486
  • feat: edit robot target url by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/485
  • fix: excess gap between text fields by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/487
  • fix: remote browser height sizing by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/484
  • feat: better DOM parsing and highlighting by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/488
  • feat: reduce highlighter thickness by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/490
  • feat: enhance screencast quality by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/491
  • fix: improve list container detection and highlighting by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/493
  • fix: session secret by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/494
  • feat: migrate session storage to postgres by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/495
  • docs: redis port minor changes by @ninja-programmer in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/499
  • feat: remote browser performance optimization by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/496
  • refactor: enhance RunsTable component layout by @theanuragg in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/497
  • fix: handling unexpected browser context closed error by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/498
  • feat: automate db migrations by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/500
  • chore: pre-release 0.0.12 by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/502
  • revert db migrations by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/504

New Contributors

  • @theanuragg made their first contribution in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/497

Full Changelog: https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/compare/v0.0.11...v0.0.12

entry.title: New release for Maxun: Maxun v0.0.13 | Retrain Robot, Infra Updates +++
entry.content:
What's New

ü§ñ Retrain Robot

You can now retrain an existing robot! This feature allows you to: - Update a robot‚Äôs logic by just point and click - Seamlessly adapt to website structure changes

To retrain a robot, simply open the options dropdown on any robot and select ‚ÄúRetrain‚Äù.

‚ö†Ô∏èRedis Deprecation

We‚Äôve officially removed Redis from our architecture. All robot scheduling is now handled directly through PostgreSQL, resulting in: - Simplified infrastructure - Fewer dependencies

What's Changed

  • fix: chromium installation for local setup by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/508
  • feat: use pgBoss for scheduling robots by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/507
  • chore: cleanup by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/515
  • fix: remove page timeout for pagination by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/517
  • fix: change checkbox ui color by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/520
  • ‚ö†Ô∏è feat: deprecate redis dependency from v0.0.13 ‚ö†Ô∏è by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/510
  • fix: output preview displays result immediately for scroll pagination by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/522
  • chore(docker): !copy maxun-core during build by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/518
  • fix: browser crashes due to scroll input event by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/523
  • fix: display the latest run name for each robot run by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/525
  • fix: display abort status for aborted run by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/527
  • feat: retrain robot by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/530
  • fix: notifies run finished prematurely by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/532
  • fix: browser pool circular dependency by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/536
  • fix: Rendered browser image stretches for some sites by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/540
  • feat: enable URL-safe encoding for DB passwords with special characters by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/542
  • fix: list selector highlighting by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/544
  • feat: link maxun cloud ü•≥ by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/546
  • fix: links not being scraped by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/552
  • feat: execute abort operation using queue by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/528
  • chore: pre-release v0.0.13 by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/550

Full Changelog: https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/compare/v0.0.12...v0.0.13

entry.title: New release for Maxun: Maxun v0.0.15 | Introducing Webhooks! üöÄ
entry.content:
What's New

üîó Webhook Support

We‚Äôve added support for webhooks to help you integrate Maxun more deeply into your workflows.

‚úÖ Available Webhooks

  1. Run Finished: Triggered when a run completes successfully.
  2. Run Failed: Triggered when a run fails due to an error.

These webhooks allow you to: - Notify third-party services (Slack, Discord, etc.) - Trigger automations - Log or analyze run results externally

üìò How to Use

Read the full setup guide here: Webhooks Documentation

What's Changed

  • fix: broken env var table by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/592
  • fix: SSL certificate error on proxy configured browser launch by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/590
  • fix: remove version from docker compose by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/594
  • feat: byop config by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/595
  • feat: update robot description for multiple actions by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/597
  • fix: remove reference to non-exported width property by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/603
  • chore: cleanup by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/604
  • feat: improve selector generation highlighting by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/591
  • feat: remove authenticated socket logic by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/598
  • feat: override anchor container selection by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/600
  • fix: remove left side panel width setting by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/605
  • fix: wrap symbol in String() for safe conversion by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/606
  • fix: remove menu width adjustment on tab selection by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/608
  • feat: generate truly unique action ids by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/609
  • feat: move web2api to api key section by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/611
  • feat: webhook support by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/610
  • feat: discard only current active action by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/602
  • fix: increase timeout on url change by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/616
  • chore: pre-release v0.0.15 by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/614
  • fix: define module in commonjs scope by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/617
  • feat: run migrations before start script by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/618
  • feat: link webhooks docs by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/619

Full Changelog: https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/compare/v0.0.14...v0.0.15

entry.title: New release for Maxun: Maxun v0.0.16 | Fail-Safe Data Extraction
entry.content:
What's New

üõ°Ô∏è Fail-Safe Data Extraction

Introducing support for partial data returns - if a robot run is aborted or fails midway, you‚Äôll still receive all data extracted up to that point. This ensures you never lose valuable data, even during unexpected interruptions.

What's Changed

  • fix: broken env var table by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/592
  • fix: SSL certificate error on proxy configured browser launch by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/590
  • fix: remove version from docker compose by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/594

  • feat: override anchor container selection by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/600
  • fix: remove left side panel width setting by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/605
  • fix: wrap symbol in String() for safe conversion by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/606
  • fix: remove menu width adjustment on tab selection by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/608
  • feat: generate truly unique action ids by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/609
  • feat: move web2api to api key section by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/611

  • fix: increase timeout on url change by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/616
  • chore: pre-release v0.0.15 by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/614
  • fix: define module in commonjs scope by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/617

entry.title: New release for Maxun: üöÄ Maxun v0.0.17 | New Recorder + MCP Server üöÄ
entry.content:
We‚Äôve just shipped one of the biggest updates to Maxun yet - including a complete overhaul of our recorder and a brand-new local LLM integration layer.

‚ö° DOM-Based Recorder

We‚Äôve switched from image-based recording to a DOM-based recorder, and the difference is massive.

  • üß† Real-time fidelity : What you see is what gets captured
  • üöÄ Faster + lighter : No more bulky screenshots for every change
  • üß© Better detection : Elements, structure, and interactions are captured more precisely

This brings Maxun recording in line with how modern browsers and apps behave - giving you a more accurate and high-performance experience.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a3b6dfd9-ed33-404d-8f07-f5d9c84d6fdf

‚ú® Maxun MCP Server - Run Maxun from Your Local LLM

You can now control Maxun using natural language inside your local AI apps like Claude Desktop.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6257fb24-b70e-434e-8f46-ead89da71147

What You Can Do? Just talk to your LLM

  • ‚ÄúShow me all my robots‚Äù
  • ‚ÄúRun robot abc123‚Äù
  • "What happened in run abc100 for robot abc123?"

No special commands. The LLM will automatically use Maxun‚Äôs tools for you.

üìò Read the MCP setup guide here: https://docs.maxun.dev/category/mcp

What's Changed

  • feat: db migrations for docker setup by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/620
  • fix: download csv and json list data by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/625
  • chore: cleanup old docker files by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/634
  • chore: archive bullmq worker by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/635
  • chore: bump @axios from 0.26.0 to 1.9.0 by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/637
  • feat: unified run creation and execution by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/628
  • feat: browser performance optimization by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/640
  • feat: return partial run results for abort and failed runs by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/636
  • fix: abort operation by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/629
  • chore: pre-release v0.0.16 by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/641
  • docs: clearer usage of google client secret env variable by @ninja-programmer in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/644
  • feat: docs tab in main menu by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/642
  • feat(ui): consistent style based on mode by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/643
  • feat: recorder revamp by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/654
  • feat: remove duration from preview text by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/652
  • feat: MCP server support by @RohitR311 in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/638
  • chore: pre-release v0.0.17 by @amhsirak in https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/pull/655

Full Changelog: https://github.com/getmaxun/maxun/compare/v0.0.16...v0.0.17
